Title: KKR Real Estate Finance Trust
Manager: Wells Fargo Securities/ Morgan Stanley/ KKR
CO_managers: Barclays/ Goldman, Sachs/ J.P. Morgan/ Keefe, Bruyette & Woods (A Stifel Company)
Business: KREF is a real estate finance company that focuses primarily on originating and acquiring senior mortgage loans secured by CRE assets. Our investment strategy is to originate or acquire senior mortgage loans collateralized by institutional-quality CRE assets that are owned and operated by experienced and well-capitalized sponsors and located in liquid markets with strong underlying fundamentals. Our target assets also include mezzanine loans, preferred equity and other debt-oriented instruments with these characteristics
